value:
Prince Alfonse seems thoughtful
and considerate. He will be an
excellent ruler of this realm.

Oh, my dear sister, Lachesis...
I know that I vowed to come back
soon, alive and well.$k$pBut circumstances have
changed.

In my world I was prepared to face
death, but some twist of fate has
brought me here.$k$pPerhaps this too is part of the
tangled nature of destiny.

A knight's loyalty must remain
absolute. My sister sees it differently,
but I cannot veer from duty.

My great friend Sigurd has a young
son named Seliph. I wonder, in this
unusual realm we stand in...$k$pcould I possibly meet Seliph as a
grown man—surely, a heroic figure like
his father? That would be marvelous.

My name is Eldigan. I come bearing
the friendliest of greetings from
$Nf.

I will reach for even loftier
goals. This I swear.

A knight must strive for the
heights of excellence.

Inadequate. Has my grasp of
greatness slipped?

I vow to put this power to certain
purpose.

I am Eldigan. Those who defy my lord
will meet my blade. But I trust that
you and I will have no such problem.

After I was summoned into this realm,
I had a strange revelation.$k$pWhere I came from, I placed my
absolute loyalty in my lord. But
here, that lord is you.$k$pA knight of my caliber must serve
his lord—no matter what the
cut of that lord.$k$pSo I have always believed. But I will
confess this, now that I have
spent so much time with you.$k$pI am honored to pledge my sword
to a master of your qualities.$k$pStill, a knight cannot choose his
master, and so I count myself most
fortunate to have met you.$k$pAgain and always—I forever pledge
my sword and my loyalty to you.
はぁっ！
せいっ！
うああっ！
You are good...
By Mystletainn!
No mercy!
Yield or perish!
I will finish you!
Forgive me...
Ha
I am ever steeled for duty. But for conversation? A bit wooden.
What?! Oh, I thought you a foe. Employ prudence.
What is chivalry but taking a friend's cause to heart?
Honorable knights must sometimes end things honorably—with a battle.
I wield Mystletainn, the Demon Sword, a blade once held by one of the 12 legendary crusaders in my world.
I often wonder if my fatherland is in a state of ruin.
I am a knight. And you, my master here. Thus, I will protect you.
Ah.
Shall we?
Let's go.
